Hero.title: MOTHER OF NUMBY
Hero.slogan: MOTHER OF NUMBY IS THE PREMIUM LINE OF NO PAIN.
Hero.videoParagraph1: Mother of Numby is No Pain's new anesthetic cream, tested by tattoo artist Emanuel Tres Palacios (Medellín, 10–12 years of experience). First take: it contains 3× more than No Pain, has a different scent, and a smoother, easier-to-apply texture.
Hero.videoParagraph2: Apply by covering the skin and wait 90–120 minutes for full numbness. After 4 days, the piece healed very fast with no side effects; it actually aided healing. Conclusion: Mother of Numby—highly recommended for artists.
Hero.videoParagraph2_1: Learn the proper technique for applying anesthetic cream to maximize comfort and effectiveness. Our expert guide shows you the step-by-step process to ensure optimal numbing for your clients.
Hero.videoParagraph2_2: Discover how to prepare the skin, apply evenly, and achieve consistent results every time. With Monumby, your clients experience true comfort without compromise.
Hero.videoParagraph3_1: See real-world results from professional tattoo artists using Monumby products. Watch how our premium line delivers superior comfort and faster healing for stunning artwork.
Hero.videoParagraph3_2: From application to recovery, Monumby's complete care system ensures your clients leave happy and your artwork heals perfectly. This is the Monumby difference.
Hero.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback.

product1.name: Mother of Numby
product1.description: Ultra-concentrated topical anesthetic for large-scale tattoos. Long-lasting effect and maximum comfort.

product2.name: Healing Serum
product2.description: Premium skin recovery. Natural formula that accelerates healing and protects your colors.

product3.name: Witch Hazel Tonic
product3.description: Professional cleansing and antibacterial care. The perfect complement for your post-tattoo routine.

product4.name: Glow Healing Serum
product4.description: Numby's Glow Healing Serum accelerates recovery with deep hydration, keeping your colors vibrant and your art flawless. Feel the magic in every drop!

product5.name: Monumby
product5.description: Monumby becomes the essential ally for tattoo artists and clients, providing fast and effective relief so art flows without barriers. Discover Monumby and take your passion for tattooing to the next level!

product6.name: Monumby Serum
product6.description: Monumby's serum, a symbol of care and strength, quickly nourishes your tattoo journey. Unleash your art with Monumby and make every mark tell your story!

product7.name: Monumby Serum & Spray
product7.description: Monumby's serum and spray, essential tattoo allies, combine with the artist's precision for a smoother, more professional process. Trust Monumby to make every session memorable with comfort and style!

Hero.carouselText1: Mother of Numby is the secret of professional artists. With 50% anesthetic actives and a vasoconstrictor-free formula, it guarantees 90-120 minutes of absolute comfort. Accelerated healing, perfect results.
Hero.carouselText2: After art comes healing. Our Monumby Serum accelerates recovery with a formula that protects colors and keeps skin hydrated. Your tattoo deserves the best care.
Hero.carouselText3: Cleansing is the first step. With 100% natural Witch Hazel Tonic, you disinfect professionally without compromising skin delicacy. Astringent, safe, effective.
Hero.carouselText4: Glow is more than a serum: it's the promise of radiant recovery. Deep hydration + fast healing = vibrant colors that last. Every drop is magic for your art.
Hero.carouselText5: Monumby is movement. It's the fusion of innovation and tradition in every application. From the first moment, your client will feel the difference. That's the power of Monumby.
Hero.carouselText6: Pure Monumby Serum. Essential post-tattoo care that accelerates healing while protecting every pigment. Light, quick-absorbing, effective. What your tattoos need after every session.
Hero.carouselText7: When you need total control: serum + spray. The perfect combination for professional care. Hydrates, protects, and disinfects in one step. Complete confidence for demanding artists.
Hero.carouselText8: The Healing Serum is your invisible ally. While your client rests, the formula works: accelerated healing, reduced inflammation, colors preserved. Results that speak for themselves.
Hero.carouselText9: Protection from within. Witch Hazel Tonic penetrates deeply, fighting bacteria and restoring skin balance. Natural, powerful, professional. The care that meets the highest standards.
Hero.carouselText10: Second application, double result. Monumby Serum as a healing base, repeated during the first days: guaranteed recovery. Your client will see the difference from day one.
Hero.carouselText11: Antiseptic tonic for every session. Use Witch Hazel between appointments to maintain antibacterial cleansing. Prevention is better than cure. That's how we think at Monumby.
Hero.carouselText12: Holistic Monumby: anesthetic, serums, and tonics working together. From session to complete healing, every step is optimized. That's Monumby professionalism.
Hero.carouselText13: Care starts here: with anesthesia that doesn't hurt, serum that heals fast, and tonic that protects. Mother of Numby begins the magic; our serums complete it. Safe art, happy client.
Hero.carouselText14: Perfect ending: Glow Serum is the final piece of the puzzle. After healing, leave your tattoo radiant, moisturized, protected. The culmination of Monumby care.
Hero.carouselText15: Witch Hazel Tonic: the silent guardian. Antiseptic, healing, safe. Use it at every stage of post-tattoo care. Monumby is completeness, and every product is essential.
Hero.carouselText16: Close the circle with Glow. Hydration, radiance, protection. The final serum your clients need to make their tattoo a completely healed and radiant masterpiece.

testimonial1.quote: A game-changer for my art. Client comfort skyrocketed and my work reached another level.

MonumbyProducts.title: PREMIUM CARE LINE
MonumbyProducts.subtitle: Monumby's three pillars of professional tattoo care

product1.name: Mother of Numby
product1.description: Ultra-concentrated topical anesthetic with 50% active agents. Formulated with sodium channel blockers and potentiated antiinflamatory, analgésic, and antibacterial compounds. Extended duration (90 minutes - 2 hours) without vasoconstrictors. Protects pigmentation integrity.

product2.name: Monumby Healing Serum
product2.description: Advanced cicatrizante serum with dual formulation (oleosa + acuosa). Combines ultra-concentrated active ingredients with rapid absorption technology. 15ML presentation for complete post-tattoo care protocol.

product3.name: Monumby Witch Hazel Tonic
product3.description: 100% natural Hamamelis virginiana distilled tonic. Astringent action with uniform pigment distribution properties. Versatile formula for preparation and post-tattoo care. 150ML presentation.

Nosotros.title: OUR STORY
Nosotros.subtitle: The origin of a tattoo care revolution
Nosotros.originParagraph1: Monumby was born from the legacy of No Pain, the pioneering brand in topical anesthesia for tattoos that revolutionized the industry with exceptional quality products and professional trust.
Nosotros.originParagraph2: Mother of Numby represents the natural evolution of years of experience, research, and active listening to the tattoo artist community. It's the answer to the demand for a premium line that combines maximum efficacy with the highest quality natural ingredients.
Nosotros.nopainParagraph1: No Pain built its reputation by providing effective and safe solutions for thousands of artists around the world. Its commitment to quality and innovation laid the foundation for what would come next.
Nosotros.nopainParagraph2: Monumby is the premium extension of this philosophy: it maintains No Pain's core values—safety, efficacy, and trust—while elevating every aspect to a superior level of luxury and performance.
Nosotros.nopainParagraph3: The creation of Monumby by No Pain was no accident, but the result of years listening to professionals who asked for something more: longer duration, better texture, natural ingredients, and comprehensive care that accompanies the entire tattoo process.
Nosotros.missionParagraph1: To empower tattoo artists and their clients with premium products that transform every session into an exceptional experience.
Nosotros.missionParagraph2: We believe that tattoo art deserves the best possible care. That's why every Monumby product is formulated with:
Nosotros.value1Description: We accept nothing less than perfection in every formula
Nosotros.value2Description: We constantly evolve to stay at the forefront
Nosotros.value3Description: Safety and satisfaction are our priority
Nosotros.value4Description: We grow alongside the artists who trust us
Nosotros.closingParagraph: Monumby is not just a brand, it's a movement. Every product tells a story of passion, dedication, and respect for tattoo art. Welcome to the Monumby family.

FAQ.pageDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about Monumby and our premium products for professional tattoo artists.

monumby.title: About Monumby
monumby.a1: Monumby is the premium line from No Pain Brand, specifically designed for professional tattoo artists seeking the highest quality products. Mother of Numby, our flagship anesthetic cream, offers 3 times more content than traditional creams, with an ultra-concentrated formula for extended tattoo sessions.
monumby.q2: How is Monumby different from No Pain?
monumby.a2: While No Pain offers accessible solutions for everyone, Monumby represents the best of the best: higher concentration, more product quantity, premium textures, exclusive aromas, and proven effectiveness in large-scale sessions. It's the choice of professional artists who don't compromise on quality.
monumby.q3: Where can I buy Monumby products?
monumby.a3: Monumby is available through authorized distributors throughout Latin America. Contact us to find the nearest distributor or for wholesale distribution inquiries.
monumby.q4: How long does Mother of Numby's effect last?
monumby.a4: Mother of Numby provides complete pain blocking after 90-120 minutes of application, with an effect that can last the entire tattoo session, even in 6-8 hour works. Its ultra-concentrated formula guarantees maximum comfort throughout the process.
monumby.a5: Absolutely. All our products are formulated with pharmaceutical-grade ingredients, dermatologically tested, and comply with all international regulations. Additionally, they are tested by professional tattoo artists in real working conditions.

tintas.title: Monumby Inks
tintas.a1: Our inks are formulated with the highest quality pigments, offering vibrant colors, perfect consistency, and optimal healing. Each batch is tested to guarantee sterility and exceptional performance on skin.
tintas.a2: Yes, all our inks are 100% vegan and cruelty-free. They contain no animal-derived products and have not been tested on animals.
tintas.q3: How should I store the inks?
tintas.a3: Store inks in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight. Keep containers tightly closed when not in use. With proper care, they maintain optimal quality until the expiration date.
tintas.a4: Yes, our inks comply with all international regulations including EU REACH and pigment safety standards. Each product includes certificates of sterility and composition.

cremas.title: Creams and Care
cremas.q1: Can I use Mother of Numby on sensitive skin?
cremas.a1: Mother of Numby is formulated to be effective yet gentle. However, we recommend doing a patch test on a small area 24 hours before if the client has very sensitive skin or a history of allergies. In case of reaction, discontinue use immediately.
cremas.q2: Does the Healing Serum really help with healing?
cremas.a2: Yes, our serum contains active ingredients like panthenol, allantoin, and natural extracts that accelerate cell regeneration, reduce inflammation, and keep skin hydrated. Tattoos treated with our serum heal faster and with brighter colors.
cremas.q3: How often should I apply the serum after tattooing?
cremas.a3: Apply a thin layer 2-3 times a day after gently cleaning the tattoo. During the first 3-5 days is when the serum works most effectively. Continue until the skin is completely healed (typically 2 weeks).
cremas.q4: Can I combine Monumby products with other brands?
cremas.a4: While our products are designed to work together in synergy, they are compatible with other quality products. However, for best results, we recommend using the complete Monumby line: from anesthesia to post-tattoo care.

FAQ.ctaText: Our team is ready to help you. Contact us and we'll answer all your questions about Monumby products.

Privacy.title: PRIVACY POLICY

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.p1: At Monumby, we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website and use our services.
section1.p2: By using our website, you accept the practices described in this policy. If you do not agree with these practices, please do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.p1: We may collect the following types of information:
section2.item1: Contact information: name, email, phone number when you contact us or subscribe to our newsletter.
section2.item2: Browsing information: IP address, browser type, pages visited, and visit time through cookies and similar technologies.
section2.item3: Order information: product details, shipping and billing information when you make a purchase.
section2.item4: Communications: message content when you communicate with our support team.

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
section3.p1: We use the collected information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process orders, respond to inquiries, send product updates and promotions (if you have given consent), and analyze website usage to improve user experience.
section3.p2: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes without your explicit consent.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.p1: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration. However, no method of Internet transmission is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.p1: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information, object to the processing of your data, and withdraw your consent at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us through our communication channels.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
section6.p1: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the new policy on this page with a revised update date.

Privacy.questions: Have questions about our privacy policy?

Terms.title: TERMS OF USE

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.p1: By accessing and using the Monumby website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you should not use this site.
section1.p2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically to stay informed of updates.

section2.title: 2. Use of Website
section2.p1: By using our website, you agree to:
section2.item1: Provide accurate and up-to-date information when required.
section2.item2: Not use the site for illegal or unauthorized purposes.
section2.item3: Not attempt to access restricted areas of the site or interfere with its operation.

section3.title: 3. Products and Services
section3.p1: All products and services are subject to availability. We reserve the right to limit quantities, discontinue products, or refuse orders at our discretion. Prices are subject to change without notice.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.p1: All content on the Monumby website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Monumby or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.p1: Monumby shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our products or services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

section6.title: 6. Product Use
section6.p1: Our products are designed for professional use by trained tattoo artists. It is the user's responsibility to follow all usage instructions and safety precautions. Monumby is not responsible for product misuse.

section7.title: 7. Applicable Law
section7.p1: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law. Any dispute related to these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent courts.

Terms.questions: Have questions about our terms of use?
